includedAssets.title: Sweet Baby
includedAssets.synopsis: Political thriller from Shonda Rhimes. Crisis management guru Olivia Pope (Kerry Washington) is hired by her former boss: the president.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Political thriller from Shonda Rhimes. Crisis management guru Olivia Pope (Kerry Washington) is hired by her former boss: the president.

includedAssets.title: Dirty Little Secrets
includedAssets.synopsis: Olivia and the team take on DC's finest madam when her list of clientele threatens to send shockwaves through Washington's elite.

includedAssets.title: Hell Hath No Fury
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep3 - Hell Hath No Fury
includedAssets.synopsis: When a millionaire's son is accused of rape, Olivia might not be able to save him. Elsewhere, Amanda Tanner requests an audience with Fitz.

includedAssets.title: Enemy of the State
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep4 - Enemy of the State
includedAssets.synopsis: Friends become enemies when Olivia and White House chief of staff Cyrus have opposing views on the Amanda Tanner case.

includedAssets.title: Crash and Burn
includedAssets.synopsis: When Amanda Tanner goes missing, Olivia calls upon Huck and his dark past to locate her. Meanwhile, the team defend a pilot.

includedAssets.title: The Trail
includedAssets.synopsis: Flashbacks reveal how Olivia and Fitz first met on the campaign trail, as well as how each of Olivia's associates joined her team.

includedAssets.title: Grant for the People
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep7 - Grant for the People
includedAssets.synopsis: In the season one finale, Quinn and Fitz both turn to Olivia when they find themselves in the worst crises of their lives.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: Former White House communications director Olivia Pope (Kerry Washington) starts a crisis management firm to protect powerful clients from scandals, while trying to move on from her complicated past with the president (Tony Goldwyn). Award-winning political thriller.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Olivia Pope (Kerry Washington) starts a crisis management firm to protect powerful clients, while trying to move on from her past with the president.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Former White House communications director Olivia Pope (Kerry Washington) starts a crisis management firm to protect powerful clients from scandals, while trying to move on from her complicated past with the president (Tony Goldwyn). Award-winning political thriller.

includedIn.title: Scandal
includedIn.synopsis: Former White House Communications Director Olivia Pope starts a crisis management firm to protect the images of powerful clients, while trying to move on from her complicated past with the President.
